publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2387 Ms Sandra White: The Charter for Equality and Diversity in Ageingâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the launch of the Charter for Equality and Diversity in Ageing which calls upon public bodies and service providers to take positive steps to improve the quality of life for all older people in Scotland and to promote positive attitudes to equality and diversity in ageing across all services and sections of the community; recognises the work of Age Concern Scotland, the Black and Minority Ethnic Elders Group and other organisations which have made the charter possible, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to give whatever help is necessary to support the aims of the charter.
S1M-2387 The Charter for Equality and Diversity in Ageing (lodged on 31 October 2001) Stewart Stevenson*, Michael Matheson*, Donald Gorrie*, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-2387 The Charter for Equality and Diversity in Ageing (lodged on 31 October 2001) Robin Harper*
S1M-2387 The Charter for Equality and Diversity in Ageing (lodged on 31 October 2001) Fiona Hyslop*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-2387 The Charter for Equality and Diversity in Ageing (lodged on 31 October 2001) Linda Fabiani*, Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-2387 The Charter for Equality and Diversity in Ageing (lodged on 31 October 2001) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Tricia Marwick*
S1M-2387 The Charter for Equality and Diversity in Ageing (lodged on 31 October 2001) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-2387 The Charter for Equality and Diversity in Ageing (lodged on 31 October 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
